X.i.4.D.3.c
.
Obtaining Evidence of Naturalized Citizenship
To establish naturalized U.S. citizenship, obtain
verification from the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) (formerly the Immigration and Naturalization Service), or
an original or genuine and unaltered copy of a U.S. passport.
Reference
:Â  For more information on evidence of naturalized citizenship, see
38 CFR 3.42(c)(2)
, and
38 CFR 3.43(c)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D - Awards and Payments for Benefits Due to Philippine Service
